unparsed_output: According to the text, each issue will be produced on a quarterly basis with a serious clinical look. It can be mailed independently by Wyeth-Ayerst to a variety of targeted physicians, though it is recommended that representatives present it to their physicians for greatest impact. Various authors of articles in the newsletter can provide suggested responses for difficult questions or objections to implementing hormone replacement therapy and offer the "expert perspective," to enhance the level of representative education and sales productivity.
